text: Among the manufacturing industries;Volume of products of Furniture (27.8%), Other non-metallic mineral products (10.4%) andFabricated Metal Product(10.2%)have shown remarkable increases in April, 2017 compared to that of April, 2016 while the volume of food products has increased by 0.1 %.The manufacturing industries; Volume of Wood and products of wood (22.3%) and Chemical and Chemical products (9.8%) and Tobacco products (8.6%) decreased during this period.The Index of Industrial Production (IIP) has increased by 1.8% in April, 2017 compared to the same month of 2016, Director General of DCS, Dr. A.J. Satharasinghe said. Among the manufacturing industries;Volume of products of Furniture (27.8%), Other non-metallic mineral products (10.4%) andFabricated Metal Product(10.2%)have shown remarkable increases in April, 2017 compared to that of April, 2016 while the volume of food products has increased by 0.1 %.The manufacturing industries; Volume of Wood and products of wood (22.3%) and Chemical and Chemical products (9.8%) and Tobacco products (8.6%) decreased during this period.
title: IIP increases in April
